channel.title: Adding bitmap?

item.title: Adding bitmap?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Try that, it’s a Tutorial by Kane, It will help you alot with this.

Also, It’s good to see you using SRL and from my quick glance with my 6 hours sleep it looks right
But try using a longer string in ChooseOption or it will choose the highest occurance of ‘uy’(Which will be Buy 1) perhaps use ‘uy 10’ or something that will distinguish it from other possible options

Read full topic

item.title: Adding bitmap?
item.dc:creator: @i_break_rules i break rules
item.description:
@i_break_rules wrote:

How would I add a cosmic rune bitmap to this;

program CosmicBuyer;
{.include Srl/srl.scar}
var
a : Integer;
Procedure BuyTehCosmics;
Begin
If (FindbitMapIn(CosmicRune, x, y, MSx1, MSy1, MSx2, MSy2)) Then
Begin
Repeat
Mouse(x, y, 10, 10, False);
Wait(250+random(250));
ChooseOption(‘uy’);
a:=A+1;
Until(a >= 100)
End;
end;

begin
BuyTehCosmics;
End.

I need a cosmic rune bitmap. I’ve looked at tutorial but nothing seems to help. The purpose of this script it to buy cosmics at mage training arena. I will manually switch worlds and open up the store.

Read full topic
